summary: This module provides a Checkov resource check for Google Cloud Pub/Sub topics in Terraform configurations. It evaluates whether a Pub/Sub topic is configured with private access by inspecting its IAM policy bindings and flags topics that allow public or unauthenticated access, returning a pass or fail result for security compliance.
business_intent: Enable organizations to enforce security best practices by automatically detecting and preventing publicly accessible Pub/Sub topics in their infrastructure-as-code, thereby reducing the risk of data leakage and ensuring compliance with access control policies.
